I have held IBM since 1976, and not worried...

"I have held IBM since 1976, and not worried." In 1977 I went to work for a VC firm that had a big investment in Amdahl. So I followed IBM in 77 & 78. But I didn't buy until 1997 after IBM nosed up under Gerstner. I bought at $102 a before the last split so I had $51 shares. But I didn't add more until 2004 at $84. My mistake with IBM was ever selling a share. Those $51 shares would be yielding 6.7% and I would have never paid a dime of tax. My net worth would be higher by at least $250k. And I would feel a lot smarter.

I have to say I do worry, just my nature, but with IBM I worry a lot less than any other stock I have ever owned. Let's hope we never worry as much as p1sorell. Could be wrong, just seems that way from the redundant multiple negative posts daily.
